it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui.stategui

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui.stategui.State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StateTurn, StateWindow

    public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is generic State Gui's controller. It determines how GUI controller handle clicks on the differents buttons

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ButtonCheckUsabilityHandler buttonCheckUsabilityHandler
      With this handler button can understand if they have to be clickablke or not
      protected java.lang.String descriptionOfState
      This is the message that describe the state that is shown to the player
      protected GameSceneController gameSceneController
      This is the reference to the main scene of the GUI
      protected java.util.List<State> nextState
      This represent the list of state that will be after this It is used when you have to select determinate button to use a Toolcard
